name: Canadian Drama
description: A study of major Canadian playwrights with an emphasis on the creation of a national theatre, distinctive themes that emerge, and their relation to regional and national concerns. This course explores the perspectives of Qubcois, feminist, Native, queer, ethnic, and Black playwrights who have shaped Canadian theatre.
prerequisites: [ENGB03H3 and ENGB04H3 and one of ENGB05H3 or (ENGB01H3)]; or ENGB06H3 or ENGB07H3; Alternative prerequisites - [VPDB10H3 and VPDB11H3]
